U2 Song Tournament: Results!

And when I go there, I go there with you In 4th place, “I Still Haven’t Found What I’m Looking For”! In 3rd place, “One”! In 2nd place (BY A FUCKING TIEBREAKER), “Sunday Bloody Sunda”! And your pick for the … Continue reading U2 Song Tournament: Results!

U2 Song Tournament Round 1 Pt. 2
